product_name: 3M Ultrathon Clothing and Gear Insect Repellent
long_description: Keep pesky insects away by treating your clothing and gear with 3M Ultrathon Clothing and Gear insect repellent. Formula is designed to be applied directly to the exterior of your clothing and gear; can be used on netting, tents, sleeping bags and backpacks. Effectively repels mosquitoes, ticks and chiggers. Will not stain or damage clothing, fabrics, plastics, finished surfaces or outdoor gear; formula is odorless after application. 1 treatment lasts for up to 6 weeks and through 6 launderings. 8 fl. oz. bottle of 3M Ultrathon Clothing and Gear insect repellent treats a complete outfit and leaves 2 fl. oz. to treat your gear.
short_description: Keep pesky insects away by treating your clothing and gear with 3M Ultrathon Clothing and Gear insect repellent.
